lore.camphor.mint: A workstation to forge your own personal currency.
lore.camphor.stone_coin: A coin of the lowest value.
lore.camphor.copper_coin: A coin of low value, more valuable than Stone.
lore.camphor.iron_coin: A coin of medium value, more valuable than Copper.
lore.camphor.gold_coin: A coin of high value, more valuable than Iron.
lore.camphor.diamond_coin: A coin of exceptional value, more valuable than Gold.
lore.camphor.coin_purse: A bottomless bundle for your coins!
